Uses of Interface
ussr.model.Controller

Packages that use Controller
ussr.description Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
ussr.samples.atron Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.atron.natives ATRON examples based on native (implemented in C) controllers 
ussr.samples.atron.network ATRON network controller. 
ussr.samples.atron.simulations Concrete examples of ATRON simulations. 
ussr.samples.mtran Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot 
ussr.samples.odin Defintion of the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.odin.simulations Concrete Odin simulation examples. 
ussr.samples.stickybot Small example of a spherical robot with magnetic connectors on its surface. 
ussr.samples.white Simple and very preliminary example of a reconfigurable robot with hinge-joints at the edges. 
 

Uses of Controller in ussr.description
 

Methods in ussr.description that return Controller
 Controller Robot.createController()
          Create a new controller object that can be associated with the robot hardware description by getDescription
 

Uses of Controller in ussr.model
 

Subinterfaces of Controller in ussr.model
 interface ActBasedController
          Interface that a controller can implement to be executed by a scheduler thread instead of having its own thread.
 interface NativeControllerProvider
          Controller implementation for NativeController
 

Classes in ussr.model that implement Controller
 class ActControllerImpl
          Controller implementation that provides the activate method expressed in terms of the methods from ActBasedController.
 class ControllerImpl
          Abstract class providing a default implementation of the Controller interface.
 class NativeController
          A controller with a native implementation, bridged to a controller implementing the NativeControllerProvider interface.
 

Methods in ussr.model that return Controller
 Controller Module.getController()
          Get the controller associated with the module
 Controller NativeController.getInternalController()
           
 

Methods in ussr.model with parameters of type Controller
 void Module.setController(Controller controller)
          Set the controller of the module.
